thread.title: Szabolcs Szekeres
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Szabolcs Szekeres

author: Szabolcs Szekeres
title: Szabolcs Szekeres
text:
My overall experience is very positive with otticanet.com. Their customer service is exceptional. Special thanks to Manuela and Silvia whom I was dealing with. I need it extra large size sunglasses so I was back and forth with them about it, and they were always very helpful and responded immediately.
Their price is also the best currently you can find.
Shipping was quick, and they also send you a link where you can track your pair of glasses.
My only negative observation is about the glasses I received. The Carrera 97/s sunglasses are terrible quality. They look super cheap and they are very flimsy. I'm very disappointed about them!!!! This, of course, nothing to do with otticanet. This is not their fault.
